msContents.summary:
I-) Dǝrsāna Mikāʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St Michael (5r-103va) I–1) Introduction (fols. 5r-9v) I–2) Homily of Timothy (Dämatewos) of Alexandria for the 12th of Ḫǝdār (fols. 10ra-21ra); miracle (fols. 21ra-22va); commemorative notice (fols. 22va-24ra, l. 1); salām-hymn (fols. 24ra, l. 2-24rb) I–3) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Tāḫśāś (fols. 24ra-30rb); miracle (fols. 30rb-31va); commemorative notice (fols. 31va-32rb, l. 14); salām-hymn (fols. 32rb, l. 14-32rb, l. 20) I–4) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Ṭǝrr (fols. 32va-40va); miracle (fols. 40va-41va); commemorative notice (fols. 41vb-42ra, l. 9) salām-hymn (fols. 42ra, l. 10-42ra, l. 17) I–5) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Yakkātit (fols. 42rb-45va); miracle (fols. 45va-46rb); commemorative notice (fols. 46rb-46vb, l. 4); salām-hymn (fols. 46vb, l. 4-46vb, l. 10) I–6) Homily by Patriarch John of Antiochia for the 12th of Maggābit (fols. 46vb-57va); miracle (fols. 57va-58rb); commemorative notice (fols. 58rb-58va, l. 5); salām-hymn (fols. 58va, l. 6-58va, l. 13) I–7) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Miyāzyā (fols. 58va-63ra); miracle (fols. 63ra-64ra); commemorative notice (fols. 64ra-64rb, l. 21); salām-hymn (fols. 64rb, l. 21-64va, l. 6) I–8) Homily of John, Metropolitan of Ethiopia for the 12th of Gǝnbot (fols. 64va-65va); miracle (fols. 65vb-66va); commemorative notice (fols. 66va-66vb) I–9) Homily of John, Metropolitan of Aksum for the 12th of Sane (fols. 67ra-72va); miracle (fols. 72va-74vb); commemorative notice (fols. 74vb-82va), salām-hymn (fols. 82va, l. 20-82vb, l. l. 6) I–10) Homily of Bishop John for the 12th of Ḥamle (fols. 82vb-86va); miracle (fols. 86vb-87rb); commemorative notice (fols. 87rb-87va, l. 6); salām-hymn (fols. 87va, l. 6-87va, l. 13) I–11) Homily of Bishop John for the 12th of Naḥāse (fols. 87va-90ra); miracle (fols. 90ra-90va); commemorative notice (fols. 90vb-90vb, l. 20); salām-hymn (fols. 90vb, l. 20-91ra, l. 6) I–12) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th day of Maskaram (fols. 91ra, l. 6-93ra); miracle (fols. 93rb-93va); commemorative notice (fols. 93vb-93vb, l. 18); salām-hymn (fols. 93vb, l. 18-94ra) I–13) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th day of Ṭǝqǝmt (fols. 94ra-97rb); miracles (fols. 97rb-98vb); commemorative notice (fols.98vb-99va, l. 11); salām-hymn (fols. 99va, l. 11-99va, l. 17) II) Malkǝʾa Mikāʾel "Images of Michael" (99va, l. 17-103va)
Additio 1.

decoDesc.decoNote: Nomina sacra; several lines in the incipit folio; incipits of the sub-sections; elements of Ethiopic numerals; elements of the quires marks, in incipits of some texts the first two lines are rubricated; in the incipit page three groups of two lines each separated by black lines (fol. 5r, 67r); passages containing ʾasmat are rubricated (fols. 17vb, 19rb, 19va, 64va); two or three lines of the texts on many folios; elements of chapter dividers; the names of the months added recently in the upper margin by a different violet ink.
